headline.main: Should We Battle The Iraqis, Too?

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: I was jolted by the implicit premise of your Nov. 26 editorial ''The Wrong Time to Fight Iraq.'' You seem to imply acceptance in advance of a presumed decision by the Bush administration to launch a war against Iraq.
abstract: Edward Howden letter on Nov 26 editorial calls for widespread debate on whether United States should eventually attack Iraq
snippet: To the Editor:    I was jolted by the implicit premise of your Nov. 26 editorial ''The Wrong Time to Fight Iraq.'' You seem to imply acceptance in advance of a presumed decision by the Bush administration to launch a war against Iraq....
